accuracy.description: The degree to which the final answer correctly responds to the query, based on historical baseball statistics.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the logical reasoning and steps taken by the agents to arrive at the final answer.

efficiency.description: The speed and resource utilization in completing the task, considering the complexity of the steps involved.

source_reliability.description: The credibility of the sources from which the information is retrieved, impacting the trustworthiness of the answer.

answer_completeness.description: The extent to which the response provided is comprehensive and addresses all elements of the question posed.

data_contamination_prevention.description: Measures taken to ensure that the answer is free from bias or contamination from internet data not relevant to the question context.
